Package net.tangly.erp.ledger.services

Interface LedgerPort

All Superinterfaces:
net.tangly.core.domain.Port<LedgerRealm>
All Known Implementing Classes:
LedgerAdapter
public interface LedgerPort extends net.tangly.core.domain.Port<LedgerRealm>
Defines the import port for the ledger bounded domain. It is the primary port in DDD terminology.

  • Method Details

    • exportLedgerDocument

      void exportLedgerDocument(String name, LocalDate from, LocalDate to, boolean withVat, boolean withTransactions)
      Exports a ledger report with profits and losses, and assets and liabilities information for a specific time interval.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the document
      from - start of the time interval relevant for the report
      to - end of the time interval relevant for the report
      withVat - flag indicating if VAT information should be part of the report
      withTransactions - flag indicating if the transactions should be part of the report
